text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet gridhamd-answer-options-vs-q10

  • Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
    CodeDisplay
    Q10-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q10-2Mild (some feelings of worry or irritability) and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q10-3Mild (some feelings of worry or irritability) and Occasional
    Q10-4Mild (some feelings of worry or irritability) and Much of the time
    Q10-5Mild (some feelings of worry or irritability) and Almost all the time
    Q10-6Moderate (excessive worry or irritability; anxiety causes distress; may cause some impairment in functioning) and Occasional
    Q10-7Moderate (excessive worry or irritability; anxiety causes distress; may cause some impairment in functioning) and Much of the time
    Q10-8Moderate (excessive worry or irritability; anxiety causes distress; may cause some impairment in functioning) and Almost all the time
    Q10-9Severe (pervasive worry or dread; fearing the worst; apprehension obvious in demeanor or behavior; significant impairment in functioning; feelings of panic) and Occasional
    Q10-10Severe (pervasive worry or dread; fearing the worst; apprehension obvious in demeanor or behavior; significant impairment in functioning; feelings of panic) and Much of the time
    Q10-11Severe (pervasive worry or dread; fearing the worst; apprehension obvious in demeanor or behavior; significant impairment in functioning; feelings of panic) and almost all of the time
    Q10-12Very Severe (incapacitating) and Occasional
    Q10-13Very Severe (incapacitating) and Much off the time
    Q10-14Very Severe (incapacitating) and Almost all of the time
